i am a cyclist.
My parents are supportive of my musical career and help me out a lot.
i play games at the arcade , still.
I remember watching the Olympics with my family and dreaming of being an Olympian myself.

participant_2.background:
I lie to my children about eating healthy.
I like to cuddle up with my dog Wonwon on a rainy day.
i have two dogs , one pitbull and old english bulldog.
i learned piano at age 6.
I'd love to have lunch with my old coach, who taught me everything I know about football.

content.text: What is your favorite thing to do?
I love cuddling with my dogs on a rainy day.
I have two dogs too! A pitbull and an old english bulldog.
Oh my gosh, that sounds like my dream team. I love both breeds.
They are the best! I love playing with them and cuddling with them.
I know what you mean. They are so loving and affectionate.
I can't imagine my life without them.
Me neither. They are part of the family.
What else do you like to do?
I love to play piano. I started taking lessons when I was 6 years old.
That is awesome! I wish I could play piano.
It is a lot of fun. I love learning new songs and playing for my friends and family.
I bet it is. I love listening to people play piano. It is so beautiful.
Thank you! I love playing for people. It makes me happy to see them enjoy the music.
I bet it does. I know I would love it if you played for me.
I would be happy to play for you sometime.
That would be great! I love listening to piano music.
I'm glad! I love playing piano.
